title: La Porte New Luxury Community with Resort Style Amenities
posting_body: For leasing information call or text
This is the new face of La Porte: an all-inclusive, luxury apartment community in La Porte, Texas where residents engage in every moment and experience life as it should be…in living color.

Close out everyday chaos and embrace a new way of living with sleek, modern interiors and designer details…a place where residents can escape beside a resort-inspired pool, challenge themselves inside a 24-hour state-of-the athletic club, or relax with friends at the outdoor beer garden.
Create extraordinary moments within this apartment community.
Resident lounge with Billiards, Shuffleboard & Poker Table
Beer Garden with yard games and grilling stations
Platinum athletic club with cardio theater & Free weights
Private dog park with dog wash
Convenient to employers, dining, retail, parks, & recreation
Business Lounge with PC and Mac computers
